metadata.name: Take my heart
metadata.description:
Take my heart, it will last for a long time ... to keep warm.
I started this work in the most difficult period of my life .. and it means a lot to me.

The heart is made with volumetric texture paste, thus creating a 3D effect.

Natural canvas. 
 Acrylic/Oil /Texture paste 
Size: 60x80  
(The buyer will get the original painting)
